title: I got a 25 game chat ban around a 2 months ago and im still honor lvl 0.
body: I was wondering how long it takes to get out of honor lvl 0 I have not gotten a punishment since. Also i skipped a 10 game chat ban and went instantly to 25.

replies.body: Nope, we don't have a visible meter or tools to offer specifics on honor progress currently.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=acbcRVzP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-31T21:01:07.266+0000)
>
> Nope, we don't have a visible meter or tools to offer specifics on honor progress currently.

Ok, Thanks for the quick reply!

It's not just a matter time of time, but the games you play consistently without incident.  We don't t have a visible meter to indicate progress through Honor, though.  Keep playing and your honor will level up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=acbcRVzP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-31T20:54:42.137+0000)
>
> It's not just a matter time of time, but the games you play consistently without incident.  We don't t have a visible meter to indicate progress through Honor, though.  Keep playing and your honor will level up!

Would you know how many games it would take without a single incident ?
